name: Adventures of the Minotaur
description:
A game about the adventures of the Minotaur. Help the scarecrow find his head. For this, she will thank you with a coin. Cut down trees to restore health and make up for lost time. Beware of lava, because the earth is literally going out from under your feet! Run to survive!

Controls:
A\D - Move left\Move right
Space\W - Jump
E - Attack\Action
P - Pause

Authors:
Arthur Smith
Roman “Eternal” Zaryuta
Vladimir “cyBer” Pokrovsky
